prompts.name: Product Development Strategy
prompts.description: This template aids in establishing a product development strategy. Substitute {{product vision}} with the overarching aim for the product, {{market research}} with consumer insights informing the need for the product, {{development timeline}} with phases and timeframes of product creation, and {{launch strategy}} with plans for introducing the product to the market.
prompts.content: Construct a focused product development strategy comprehensively outlining your inspiring {{product vision}}, in-depth {{market research}}, detailed {{development timeline}}, and impactful {{launch strategy}}. Remember to avoid disclosing confidential feature designs or proprietary market research details.

prompts.name: Consumer Feedback Collection Plan
prompts.description: This layout assists in generating an efficient consumer feedback collection plan. Replace {{feedback channels}} with the mediums used for obtaining customer opinions, {{feedback prompts}} with the instructions or questions asked to guide feedback, {{response handling}} with processes for managing feedback responses, and {{incorporation strategy}} with how feedback is used for improvement.
prompts.content: Draft a dynamic consumer feedback collection plan, highlighting varied {{feedback channels}}, engaging {{feedback prompts}}, efficient {{response handling}}, and productive {{incorporation strategy}}. Avoid revealing sensitive customer data or proprietary data processing methods.

prompts.name: Product Branding Strategy
prompts.description: This blueprint is for structuring a competitive product branding strategy. Substitute {{brand identity}} with defining features of the product's brand, {{brand positioning}} with the unique market space the brand intends to occupy, {{brand promotion approach}} with strategies to increase brand visibility, and {{brand evolution considerations}} with plans for brand development over time.
prompts.content: Develop a compelling product branding strategy, detailing distinguished {{brand identity}}, strategic {{brand positioning}}, creative {{brand promotion approach}}, and forward-thinking {{brand evolution considerations}}. Please refrain from announcing unapproved branding decisions or revealing confidential promotional tactics.

prompts.name: Product Pricing Model
prompts.description: This template enables the creation of a viable product pricing model. Replace {{cost factors}} with the breakdown of product creation expenses, {{competitive pricing analysis}} with insights into how similar products are priced, {{value proposition}} with the benefits to consumers justifying the price, and {{price adjustment strategy}} with plans for future price changes.
prompts.content: Formulate a competitive product pricing model showcasing comprehensive {{cost factors}}, thorough {{competitive pricing analysis}}, compelling {{value proposition}}, and adaptable {{price adjustment strategy}}. Refrain from revealing specific cost information or disclosing upcoming price changes.

prompts.name: Product Lifecycle Review
prompts.description: This format aids in devising a robust product lifecycle review. Substitute {{review frequency}} with how often product stages are analysed, {{performance metrics}} with indicators used to gauge the product's success, {{intervention procedures}} with responses to underperforming products, and {{end-of-life strategy review}} with the analysis of a product's final lifecycle stage.
prompts.content: Draft a reliable product lifecycle review setting regular {{review frequency}}, insightful {{performance metrics}}, decisive {{intervention procedures}}, and reflective {{end-of-life strategy review}}. Don't discuss confidential product information or specific intervention tactics.

prompts.name: Product Portfolio Management
prompts.description: This template enables the creation of a product portfolio management strategy. Replace {{portfolio objectives}} with the designations of what your portfolio should achieve, {{portfolio composition}} with the description of your product mix, {{product interdependencies}} with the relation between different products, and {{portfolio evaluation metrics}} with the standards used to assess the portfolio's success.
prompts.content: Conceive a balanced product portfolio management plan pinpointing your {{portfolio objectives}}, analysing the dynamic {{portfolio composition}}, acknowledging the interconnected {{product interdependencies}}, and applying valuable {{portfolio evaluation metrics}}. Avoid disclosing confidential product development plans or revealing sensitive portfolio performance results.

prompts.name: Product Marketing Strategy
prompts.description: This layout assists in formulating a product marketing strategy. Substitute {{target audience identification}} with the process of defining your ideal customers, {{value proposition creation}} with the key advantages you're offering, {{marketing channel selection}} with where and how you plan to reach your audience, and {{performance tracking methods}} with your systems for measuring success.
prompts.content: Script a comprehensive product marketing strategy encapsulating precise {{target audience identification}}, captivating {{value proposition creation}}, effective {{marketing channel selection}}, and consistent {{performance tracking methods}}. Do not share detailed customer profiles or proprietary marketing approaches.

prompts.name: User Experience Design Plan
prompts.description: This blueprint aids in composing a user experience (UX) design plan. Replace {{UX research}} with the insights you have gathered about your users, {{user journey mapping}} with the path users take in your product, {{interaction design principles}} with your approach to creating engaging interfaces, and {{UX testing methods}} with your system to test and validate the user experience.
prompts.content: Formulate a user-centric UX design plan featuring empathetic {{UX research}}, visual {{user journey mapping}}, intuitive {{interaction design principles}}, and iterative {{UX testing methods}}. Refrain from showing confidential user research data or unapproved design drafts.

prompts.name: Product Partnership Strategy
prompts.description: This structure allows for a detailed product partnership strategy. Substitute {{potential partners}} with the entities for a beneficial alliance, {{partnership objectives}} with what you aim to achieve from the collaboration, {{benefit sharing}} with the distribution of returns between partners, and {{collaborative development phases}} with stages of joint product creation.
prompts.content: Craft a strategic product partnership strategy highlighting promising {{potential partners}}, clear {{partnership objectives}}, fair {{benefit sharing}}, and collaborative {{collaborative development phases}}. Donâ€™t disclose potential partnership details or sensitive negotiation insights.

prompts.name: Product Roadmap Guidelines
prompts.description: This template aids in creating a forward-thinking product roadmap. Replace {{product vision}} with the future state for your product, {{milestones}} with the key steps to reach this vision, {{potential obstacles}} with the predicted challenges along the way, and {{contingency plans}} with your alternative approaches to overcome these obstacles.
prompts.content: Develop a visionary product roadmap underscoring the bold {{product vision}}, carefully gauged {{milestones}}, identified {{potential obstacles}}, and adaptable {{contingency plans}}. Please avoid announcing unconfirmed future features or revealing confidential strategic details.
